title: Breakfast Club Court "Was Charlamagne Wrong?"
itunes:title: Breakfast Club Court "Was Charlamagne Wrong?"
description:
Today on the show we had Envy's close friend and partner, Cesar Pina and his real estate team talk credit, lenders, and generational wealth. The Breakfast Club also asked listeners their thoughts about a confrontation that happened with Charlamagne and Miley Cyrus' manager for Breakfast Club Court and Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to yet another Florida man this time it was because this Florida man was a officer who took in a 6 year old girl for throwing a tantrum.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
